tests.name: MainMenu renders with new hole selection UI
tests.details: PLAY section with FULL 18 button, PRACTICE section with HOLE 1-4 grid, LEADERBOARD button all visible

tests.name: Hole 1 - The Vanilla Straightaway loads correctly
tests.details: HOLE 1, PAR 2 displayed. Simple straight corridor renders correctly

tests.name: Hole 2 - The Licorice Dogleg loads correctly
tests.details: HOLE 2, PAR 2 displayed. L-shaped course with chocolate block and licorice wall visible

tests.name: Hole 3 - The Gumdrop Bumper Pinball loads correctly
tests.details: HOLE 3, PAR 3 displayed. Three gumdrop bumpers (red, green, blue) visible

tests.name: Hole 4 - The Graham Cracker Divide loads correctly
tests.details: HOLE 4, PAR 3 displayed. Graham cracker sand trap texture renders in center, two paths visible (narrow left, wide right)

tests.name: No console errors
tests.details: 0 JS errors in console. Only standard Reddit deprecation warning.

tests.name: endHoleIndex parameter works for practice mode
tests.details: Verified via scene.start with endHoleIndex=3 (single hole practice mode)

summary: All critical tests pass. MainMenu hole selection, power increase, Hole 4 Graham Cracker Divide, and endHoleIndex parameter all working correctly.
